original_title: BTS Japan Official Fanmeeting Vol.2: Undercover Mission
overview: BTS Japan Official Fanmeeting Vol.2: Undercover Mission was the band's second Japan official fan club event. It took place from August 13 to August 20, 2015. The DVD features performances in japanese and interaction with fans, as well as rehearsal and backstage footage.
title: BTS Japan Official Fanmeeting Vol.2: Undercover Mission
